pullRequest.title: Fix #364: jkube.watch.postExec property/parameter/configuration is ignored
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #364
Added support for copying changed files and executing a command provided in postExec option after copying files
to the application pod. However, this doesn't seem to complete watch flow as even after changing source code and building, I can see jar being copied into the container but application still shows old response. Maybe we should tackle that in a separate issue.

-archive, as shown in the following listing:

-[source,xml,indent=0,subs="verbatim,quotes,attributes"]
-----
-<plugin>
-  <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
-  <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
-  <configuration>
-    <excludeDevtools>false</excludeDevtools>
-  </configuration>
-</plugin>
